titles.title: Commending the Consortia of Administrators for Native American Rehabilitation for the many contributions it has made in Indian country through collaborative working relationships, State rehabilitation agencies, tribal health and social service programs, Capacity Building Projects, Federal service agencies, the United States Department of Education, and the United States Department of Labor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/16/2007--Introduced. Commends the Consortia of Administrators for Native American Rehabilitation for the many contributions it has made in Indian country through collaborative working relationships, state rehabilitation agencies, tribal health and social service programs, Capacity Building Projects, federal service agencies, the U.S. Department of Education, and the U.S. Department of Labor.
